item.title: ASHLAND INC 10-K
item.description: ASHLAND INC, which is in the Wholesale-Chemicals & Allied Products [5160] industry, SEC 10-K filing on November 21, 2022 had 47838 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations.
